maabacVersion2
Class ContractionV2

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractState
      maabacVersion2.ContractionV2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IState, java.io.Serializable
public class ContractionV2
extends AbstractState

A ContractionV2 is a local vision on the general state by a single muscle. This will be used as the base state class in the extended state for a muscle (field perception)

Author:
Francesco De Comite 22 nov. 06
See Also:
